definition: short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: The fourth largest quake was a magnitude 9 on Russia’s Kamchatka peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 排在第四的大地震是俄羅斯堪察加半島的9級地震。
